metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, So Central Rain has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
So Central Rain is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music.
